channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- PLM Help Server V4.2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- PLM Help Server V4.2

item.title: CVE-2022-44575|2024-08-03T13:54:03.793Z -- siemens -- plm%20help%20server%20v4.2
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in PLM Help Server V4.2 (All versions). A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the web interface of the affected application that could allow an attacker to execute malicious javascript code by tricking users into accessing a malicious link.
